title: travelplanner: Could you arrange a 5-day trip for one person, starting from Latrobe and covering two cities in South Carolina from the dates of March 2nd to March 6th, 2022? My budget is set at $4,200. (8034d1cb7a7745e1)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: Could you arrange a 5-day trip for one person, starting from Latrobe and covering two cities in South Carolina from the dates of March 2nd to March 6th, 2022? My budget is set at $4,200.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments:
{"instructions": "Plan a 5-day trip from Latrobe to two cities in South Carolina, covering the dates of March 2nd to March 6th, 2022, for one person with a budget of $4,200. Return a list of cities to visit, transportation options, accommodation options, and food recommendations for each day. The list should include the following details for each day: 

- Current city
- Transportation details
- Breakfast option
- Attraction(s) to visit
- Lunch option
- Dinner option
- Accommodation

The output should be in the following format: 

```json
[
    {
        "day": 1,
        "current_city": "City Name",
        "transportation": "Transportation details",
        "breakfast": "Restaurant/Meal",
        "attraction": [
            "Attraction 1, City",
            "Attraction 2, City"
        ],
        "lunch": "Restaurant/Meal",
        "dinner": "Restaurant/Meal",
        "accommodation": "Hotel/Hostel/Airbnb"
    },
    // Repeat the above structure for days 2, 3, 4, and 5
]
```"}

chat_history.content:
As I am unable to find flights from Latrobe to South Carolina on March 2, 2022, I have assumed you will be driving to reach your destination. Here is a 5-day trip plan based on this assumption:

```json
[
    {
        "day": 1,
        "current_city": "Charleston",
        "transportation": "Drive from Latrobe to Charleston",
        "breakfast": "Hominy Grill - Southern comfort food for breakfast",
        "attraction": [
            "Charleston Waterfront Park, Charleston",
            "The Charleston Museum, Charleston"
        ],
        "lunch": "Fulton Five - Modern American cuisine",
        "dinner": "Virginia's on King - Southern cuisine with a twist",
        "accommodation": "King Charles Inn - A historic hotel in the heart of Charleston"
    },
    {
        "day": 2,
        "current_city": "Charleston",
        "transportation": "Stay in Charleston",
        "breakfast": "Anastasia Greek Taverna - Greek breakfast",
        "attraction": [
            "South Carolina Aquarium, Charleston",
            "Fort Sumter, Charleston"
        ],
        "lunch": "XO Bistro - Southern gastropub fare",
        "dinner": "Magnolias - Southern seafood and cuisine",
        "accommodation": "King Charles Inn"
    },
    {
        "day": 3,
        "current_city": "Hilton Head",
        "transportation": "Drive from Charleston to Hilton Head",
        "breakfast": "The Breakfast Club - Classic breakfast dishes",
        "attraction": [
            "Hilton Head Island, Hilton Head",
            "The Coastal Discovery Museum, Hilton Head"
        ],
        "lunch": "WiseGuys - Italian cuisine",
        "dinner": "Aqua Star - Contemporary American seafood",
        "accommodation": "The Westin Hilton Head Island Resort & Spa - Beachfront luxury"
    },
    {
        "day": 4,
        "current_city": "Hilton Head",
        "transportation": "Stay in Hilton Head",
        "breakfast": "The Studio - Local, organic, and seasonal breakfast options",
        "attraction": [
            "Shelter Cove Towne Centre, Hilton Head",
            "Coligny Beach Park, Hilton Head"
        ],
        "lunch": "The Boathouse - Seafood and Lowcountry cuisine",
        "dinner": "Skillets and Stews - Local cuisine",
        "accommodation": "The Westin Hilton Head Island Resort & Spa"
    },
    {
        "day": 5,
        "current_city": "Myrtle Beach",
        "transportation": "Drive from Hilton Head to Myrtle Beach",
        "breakfast": "Breakfast at Tina's - Home-style Southern breakfast",
        "attraction": [
            "Myrtle Beach SkyWheel, Myrtle Beach",
            "The Market Common, Myrtle Beach"
        ],
        "lunch": "Liberty Brewery & Grill - American cuisine and craft beer",
        "dinner": "The Bowery - Fresh seafood with an ocean view",
        "accommodation": "The Breakers Resort - Oceanfront hotel"
    }
]
```

Please note that the above plan is based on my best knowledge up until January 2023, and some details may have changed since then. Feel free to check for any updates or alternative options. Enjoy your trip!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

```json

}, max_context_size=128000, hyperparams={'sampling_params': SamplingParams(n=1, presence_penalty=0.0, frequency_penalty=0.0, repetition_penalty=1.0, temperature=0.7, top_p=1.0, top_k=-1, min_p=0.0, seed=None, stop=[], stop_token_ids=[], bad_words=[], include_stop_str_in_output=False, ignore_eos=False, max_tokens=2048, min_tokens=1, logprobs=None, prompt_logprobs=None, skip_special_tokens=True, spaces_between_special_tokens=True, truncate_prompt_tokens=None, guided_decoding=None)}, pipeline=ChatTemplatePromptPipeline([]))

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
